statements: DELETE FROM car_component_cost_breakdown WHERE component_id = 1 AND cost > 1000
DELETE FROM car_component_cost_breakdown WHERE cost < 500 AND component_name LIKE 'Engine%'
DELETE FROM cars WHERE car_id = 101 AND manufacturing_year < 2010;
DELETE FROM component_costs WHERE cost < 5000 OR supplier_id = 201 AND component_id IN (SELECT component_id FROM car_components WHERE cost > 100);
DELETE FROM cars WHERE car_id = 101 AND car_year < 2010;
DELETE FROM component_usage WHERE quantity > 50 AND component_id = 205;
